DOC.brief_summary: In patient receive T3 ( Biomet 3I ) dental implant , use platform-switch concept compare use platform-matched concept , refrain marginal bone loss osseointegration phase ( t=12 week =T1 ) final rehabilitation ( t= placement final restoration = 18 weeks=T2 )
DOC.brief_title: Compare Success Rate T3 Dental Implant ( Biomet 3I ) With Without Platform-switch Concept
DOC.detailed_description: Patients private practice receive dental implant ( T3 dental implant Biomet 3I ) November 2012 October 2013 eligible enter study . Two group form : one group receive T3 dental implant platform switch concept receive implant platform match type connection . We evaluate osseointegration T1 ( 12 week ) marginal bone position relation implant platform baseline ( implant installation ) T0 T1 T2 . From data recorder T0 , T1 T2 , evaluate change marginal bone position .
DOC.criteria: Single unit implant rehabilitation Maxilla mandible Biomet 3I T3 dental implant place Final Rehabilitation place Immediate implant Radiographic impossibility measure Absence baseline T0 radiograph Smoking habit ( 10 cigaret day ) Diabetes Patients receive Radio or/and Chemotherapy
